posts.postText:
Does anyone here know how to fix this problem?
http://k.min.us/ijh5gI.jpg


P.S. I already validated files, didn't help.
Im not gonna uninstall if its a minor bug like this, its not that bad, but still annoying.

This happened to me before but on the actual steam client
(in the store, community, and stuff)


people on some forum told me that it was a corrupt file in the steam folder that you had to delete so that it could be created again but non-corrupt

the only problem is that i cant remember the name of the file. it might have had "english" in the name, not sure. but yeah uninstalling isnt necessary

Change name of garrysmod folder, play garrysmod, and let update. Play it and see if it works
If it did then you should be able to shove all of your maps/add-ons/downloads/etc from the renamed
file into it.

>> Change name of garrysmod folder, play garrysmod, and let update. Play it and see if it works
If it did then you should be able to shove all of your maps/add-ons/downloads/etc from the renamed
file into it.â€‰

Genius.
Thank you!

*ways to fix any problem* Beat it with a hammer, or reinstall :). Also, validating files has never helped me in the least. Is the file there, check, lets move on.

Changing the name of the gmod folder is the same as just reinstalling it practically. It's better to reinstall though since some files that are saved even when renaming the folder might be corrupt and cause issues further down the line. Also make sure if you did just rename the folder that you verify files anyway (useless to do but meh) and also scan your computer for fragmentation.
